name: KillChoice
description:
This game is a production of : We Gamin' and Jammin' Studios( A indie game studio made by Adil Aman.)

We love making games and are 14 years of age.... In this game you play as a happy go lucky blob; and defeat the devil or your friends...  You have a choice. Save your friends or kill them. Sounds interesting right ? Play On! 

Please don't forget to vote!!!
